title: DXC Technology
description: I joined DXC as an Associate Professional Software Engineer fresher where I got my first professional project with NAB(National Australia Bank) where I learned all about ReactJS front-end web-development from best of the mentors who were from India, Australia, Philipines & Vietnam. Experienced working with agile methodologies, using 3rd party UI Toolkit libraries & constantly evolving client requirements
bullets: Write accessible, reusable, interactive and unit-tested react components for clients that can be used across different internal projects
Engineered and maintained code for client primarily using TypeScript, ReactJS,styled-components and GraphQL
Communicate with teams of UI-engineers, UX-designers, testers and clients on day-to-day basis
